name: Space Walk (Ema)
description:
Space Walk 🚀

The three sacred stars went out ! Guided only with sound, you are the one send to space to light them back. 

⭐⭐⭐

Participation for the GDKO round 2 with the task "Tell a story using sound".

  • Sound : from the Sci-Fi Pack by Chris Logsdon and from the wonderful FreePats
  • Music : The Long Let go and Leaving The System by 1st contact

Thank you as always to Bogy and Lea for playtesting !
